襺字的基本解释

襺
jiǎn
丝绵衣服：“重襺衣裘。”
丝绵：“厥赋，布、襺。”

襺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》古典切，上銑，見。］
(1)纯用新丝绵所铺的袍。
(2)丝绵絮。

襺字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襺； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1127第29
【唐韻】古典切【集韻】【韻會】吉典切，?音繭。【說文】袍衣也。【類篇】以絮曰襺，以縕曰袍。【廣韻】纊著衣也。【禮·玉藻】纊爲襺，縕爲袍。【爾雅·釋言】袍襺也。【註】左傳曰：重襺衣裘。　【韻會】通作繭。

襺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
襺字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
jiǎn
Silk cotton clothes: "Heavy clothes and fur."
Silk Mian: "Jue Fu, Cloth, Lin."
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎn］
["Guangyun" classical cut, milling, see. ]
(1) A gown made purely with new silk floss.
(2) Silk floss.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襺; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1127 29
[Tang Yun] Classical Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ji Dian cut, sound cocoon. [Said the text] The robe and clothes are also. 【Classes】Using silk to say pu, and silk to say robe. [Guang Yun] I wear clothes. 【Rite·Yuzao】The 纩 is the yin, and the 縕 is the robe. 【Erya·Explanation】The robe is also. [Note] Zuo Chuan said: Re-clothing Qiu.　【Rhyme Club】Through cocoon.
